name: Planar Escape
description:
Singleplayer Story:
You are a circle, trapped in virtual space! Your only goal is to save yourself, and escape an entity that wants to destroy everything in its path!

Multiplayer Story:
You and a couple of friends are circles, trapped in virtual space! Your only goal is to save yourself and leave your friends to die. Be the last circle alive, make it to the end, or collect the most animated sprites to reign supreme.

Controls:
Player1: AWSD
Player2: Arrow Keys
Player3: JIKL
Player4: FTGH
(partial controller support as well!)

Developer Comment:

Hello fellow human! This is the first complete game that I made using the Unity Engine. It took me around 50 hours! I made everything from scratch, except for the font and the music. The song that plays in the game is "Spoken" by UNFA. I really do hope you try it out, and maybe you'll like something about it, too! And if this isn't your cup of tea, try the game Catherine, or PQ2. Now those games are good (and also not made by me of course!). : )

Also, if you want to play the game on your browser, click the link below!

https://itch.io/embed-upload/1771748?color=000000
